DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate that an individualized, formula-based Genotropin regimen for children with Idiopathic Short Stature will lead to a targeted height gain (to reach the target of 10th percentile (%), or -1.3 SDS) during 24 months of treatment. The endpoint at 4 years is to explore treatment efficiency over four years of two formula-based dose regimens (sub-arms) compared to standard treatment
DOC.brief_title: Individualized, Target-Driven Treatment Of Children With Idiopathic Short Stature
DOC.criteria: Prepubertal children with bone ages between 3 and 10 years of age for males and 3 and 9 years of age for females Naive to Growth Hormone treatment Abnormal karyotype. Small Gestational Age and Skeletal dysplasia.
